language.entry: The mind is fractured.
Distressed... Disturbed...
The mind's defenses crumble against the tide.
Rage brings power, fury... And contempt.
Anger drives us apart, and divided, we fall.
Frustration and hatred; curses from the dawn of humanity.
The challenge appears... Insurmountable.
How could one stand beside a lost cause?
The task is too daunting for this one.
They have given in to the terror, and become lost.
Cowardice is survival, or so they tell themselves.
Bravery has been foresaken in the throes of combat.
Fortitude falls. Madness sets in.
The grasp on sanity slips away...
Madness in... Madness out.
Leaning into the pain can only go so far.
To handle the suffering, they've come to admire it.
The destructive adoration of pain...
Overwhelming doubt...
Camaraderie fails under the strain.
Without faith in one another, how can we survive?
What can one do but look out for one's self?
The panic divides us...
In the struggle, they have lost sight of their allies.
Towering, fierce, terrible. Nightmare made material!
Snuffed out, like a candle in the rain.
We have lost that most precious treasure today...
Nothing left to be done. Do not let their death be meaningless.
The pain of loss... We must march on for them.
Do not surrender, we need you!
Their strength is tested...
They are in peril. Do not fall!
Stand your ground.
Act quickly. This life cannot be wasted.
The teeth grit... They cling to life.
Weakened...
Strength fades.
The body fails to withstand.
Hampered.
Impaired.
A dreadful hit...
Stand tall! We must recover.
Do not waver! The fight goes on!
A terrible hit...
Injuries accumulate. We must act!
Harden yourself! This battle is not yet over!
We must recover!
Come now, back on your feet!
Wounds and fatigue are mounting.
How much further can one continue at this rate?
The terror that creeps...
Terrible horror, gnawing on the mind.
Haunting thoughts overwhelm.
Fear, clawing at the senses.
We had not properly prepared, and must endure the consequences.
No tools for the task... Yet we must press on.
Next time, we will be prepared. This time, we toil.
A wise leader takes far more than bloodshed into account.
This land is ancient and fallen into disrepair.
More than our enemies will attempt to impede us.
No challenge is without its barriers. Both proverbially and physically.
Take up the spades, this is nothing to trouble ourselves over.
The glory will come, for now there is labour.
How can we fight on empty bellies?
A soldier shouldn't march on an empty stomach.
Hunger will bring weakness and distraction.
Going without... Something I have felt many times.
The pain of starvation takes its toll upon us.
Use your other senses when your vision fails you.
The Amber glows brightly in the dark.
When the path is unclear, rely upon each other.
Where danger lurks, so too do riches.
Ai... Step lightly!
We must keep eyes peeled!
This land is filled with unseen dangers.
Be more careful!
We must be more vigilant.
The Kvarotz put great priority in their defenses.
Such vicious devices placed in one's own city...
Victory.
A hollow and ridiculous notion.
and what sleeps is aroused once more.
To hatch from this fragile shell of earth and rock,
and bring our inescapable end.
So, seek solace in a manner befitting your lineage,
and take up your nugatory vigil,
haunted forever by that sickening prose,
echoing through the infinite blackness of space and time.
Ruin has come to our family.
We are born of this thing,
made from it,
and we will be returned to it in time.
The great family of man.
A profusion of errant flesh.
Multiplying, swarming,
living, dying.
Until the stars align in their inexorable formation
Enhanced and invigorated.
A surge of strength.
The heart pounds; the mind's eye opens.
Empowered!
Emboldened.
The power flows.
Alone we will die. Together, we will rise.
The dark and the cold are upon us. Keep each other safe by the fire.
Look out for one another. Companions are all we have.
Huddle together. The nights here are frigid.
Togetherness is a rare thing in this place.
Recover, prepare. Come dawn, we march.
Rest. We will need your strength come daybreak.
Here we answer the duelist's challenge.
Here she resides in the den of serpents. Stain her many luxuries with blood.
A hulking heap of muscle and metal. Give the audience a show.
And here she stands, confident in victory. Demonstrate to the tribes that even their mightiest shall fall.
A gargantuan beast of terrible implications, still yet to reach full maturation.
Execute it at once and we will be one step closer to putting a stop to their fiendish ambitions.
This is it! Hold fast, the gunnery is being readied to aid you.
A mesmerizing deception; it hungers for the flesh of the allured.
Cleave your way through this shifting barrier! Let no adaptation prove impregnable.
A defiler of the dead. Unmake what the Valley has errantly given birth to.
This... thing... should not be. It is a trespasser in our reality.
Eradicate this den of horrors, such that our possessions may be reclaimed.
A graceful and honorable end, for one such as he.
Leave the Levantine to witness the skin and scales on the floor.
Leave her corpse to bake in the sun. They would have done the same.
Her throes of bloodlust are brought to an end. A good death for those like her.
The wurms will appreciate this feast, but we do not have time to stop them.
The Troglodytes are vast, and small skirmishes will not stem the tide.
In all my time as a sailor, I have never witnessed such a spectacular victory. Hm, I admit, this was quite the thrill.
The malignant flower is finally reduced to pulp, and the surrounding thicket squirms in pain. Good.
The malignant flower is finally reduced to pulp, and the surrounding thicket squirms in pain. Good.
Do you hear that? Do you feel it? The core's death rattle is sending tremors through the earth and masonry.
It is a child of the Valley, and will return in time. For now, we focus on the task ahead
What ever cosmic nightmare bore these horrors, we shall return them to it.
Our belongings are at last freed from the pilfering nuisance. Well done.
A noble warrior given a fitting end. If only the same could be said for the remainder of the Levantine.
A serpentine demon hiding behind the veneer of human skin. A terrible threat to our very campaign.
At long last, committed to the sands and soils
The cannon is at last silenced, and left to be buried in the dunes.
The tribe may not know fear, but they understand danger.
Let the scarlet-stained sands of her camp serve as a mural to those who think we can be quelled.
A great step closer to their inner-most dwellings where the trogs sacrifice and breed one another to achieve the form of their twisted messiah.
None that I have ever seen could acheive such a feat. Your soldiers will be due a set of medals after such an unlikely success.
Our soldiers will not be defeated by some mere illusion of beauty.
The core is pulverized, and the cacti near the Reliquary writhe and wilt. All is going according to plan.
At last these things are returned to their proper owners and we are free to resume the campaign.
The Vizier's soldiers will march elsewhere for now.
An example has been set today. No trespassers.
Somehow I suspect their commanders will not miss them.
These sandstone and granite surfaces are becoming almost homely, no?
More Kvarotz relics kept out of Levantine hands. Excellent.
Another route is established. These mausoleums of technology become ever-navigable.
Excellent performance. We'll be able to send out salvage teams in mere moments.
With a clear route, we may spend less time in direct sunlight.
The perils of the desert are nothing to us.
Step into the shade. You've earned it.
Even in the cold and the dark of night we can not be swayed from the path.
You've proved these sunken structures to be ever navigable.
As much as I enjoy music, I appreciate the silenced drums more.
Their blood sacrifices are brought to a close. Fine work indeed.
Their vile chittering subsides, and their stockpiles are ripe to pilfered. Well done.
I care not who the victim is. The horrors these devils commit should be forever ceased.
To think that these aberrant terrors were once human... consider today's victory a mercy.
With a bit of cleaning, these spoils will be as good as... er, "new".
After a good rinse, you'll barely notice the stench... When you put your mind to it.
Nothing here seems particularly tainted. A good harvest!
With each vine cut and bramble broken, the overgrowth is clearing.
Landmarks are recorded and lurking dangers are exposed -You have done well.
Charted paths lead to fruitful plunder.
My my, those pockets are jangling quite loudly.
Hmm! We may need to release some balast to offset this haul.
A beautiful, gleaming bounty... -For the cause of course!
Yes. Strike true!
Spectacular!
Good. Drive them to the ground!
Yes. Yes!
Devastation!
Strike them down, do not relent!
Another obstacle is cleared from our path.
No wall cannot crumble. No tree cannot be felled.
The scavengers will eat well tonight.
Hulking mass means nothing to a fierce warrior.
Carry on. They never slowed you down.
Their resistance is quelled.
Put down.
An agonizing death. Slow, and measured.
The body's weaknesses are exploited.
Once the blood flows, the end has begun.
Drawn out and merciless...
An inevitable demise...
The hourglass empties...
A cut vein, a drop of venom. Death does not regard the method.
What a deathstroke!
Destroyed.
Devastated.
The obstacle is removed.
Dismantled.
Brought down!
They will fall. Each and every one.
Very good. Keep momentum.
The wound closes, the bones are mended. Press on.
We must care for one another.
Our injuries will mount. We must rebound.
Our care for one another is what sets us apart.
Mended.
This day is far from over. Step in good health.
Like the touch of an angel.
Exquisite.
This one will not fall.
Immeasurable life, granted.
Stand tall. We fight on!
Be strong. We will get through this.
You live on.
Shake it off. You will survive.
I am sure the previous owner will not mind.
Our cause is righteous, but requires funds.
Be gentle. For sale or for study, these artifacts are precious.
Secure it, and march on. We still have much to do.
Good. Knowing when you're in over your head is a rare quality.
Do not mistake pragmatism for cowardice.
Knowing your limit is key to survival.
What we did not take home in wealth, we took in knowledge.
Heed the lessons of your failures. They have much to teach you.
Our time will come soon. Simply... not today.
That will do. Limiting losses can be its own victory at times.
When we can withstand no more punishment, standing in defiance is pointless.
Failure is but one part of success.
We follow the ever-guiding Light.
Against the light, our foes will fall.
The darkness will not impede us. We are the flame.
Our path is revealed. March on.
Another skirmish; another step forward.
We press on. There is much to do.
Wars consist of a great many battles. Continue.
An adequate performance for now. Keep it up.
The right example can improve the morale of an entire fleet.
This one will not succumb to that creeping darkness!
The heard pounds, eyes go wide, and senses sharpen!
Determination and focus; waiting to be released.
Fatigue can wait. For now, strength takes hold.
More than a second wind- inner power is unleashed!
A glimmer of hope is all it takes to stand steadfast against evil.
The fortitude to face these horrors comes from within.
Yes! Rise above.
The might of an indomitable spirit!
Ruin has come to our family.
You remember our venerable house,
I bent every effort towards the excavation and recovery
of those long buried secrets,
exhausting what remained of our family fortune
on swarthy workmen and sturdy shovels.
At last, in the salt-soaked crags beneath the lowest foundations
we unearthed that damnable portal and antediluvian evil.
Our every step unsettled the ancient earth
but we were in a realm of death and madness!
In the end, I alone fled laughing and wailing
through those blackened arcades of antiquity.
Opulent and imperial.
Until consciousness failed me.
You remember our venerable house,
opulent and imperial.
It is a festering abomination!
I beg you, return home
claim your birthright
and deliver our family
from the ravenous clutching shadows
of the Darkest Dungeon.
Gazing proudly from its stoic perch above the moor.
I lived all my years in that ancient, rumor shadowed manor.
Fattened by decadence and luxury.
And yet, I began to tire of conventional extravagance.
Singular, unsettling tales suggested the mansion itself
was a gateway to some fabulous and unnamable power.
With relic and ritual,
This is not a man of villainy, nor a man of machinations. He is a man of honor; of dignity.
The conquest on the valley is not his calling, not his purpose. Nonetheless, he stands steadfast between us and the Reliquary.
Grant this Janissary a noble death.
This womanâ€¦ This serpent is not to be underestimated. She takes no prisoners, and leaves no survivors.
Not only appointed by the Vizier, she knows well of my... Of our intentions. Aiding the Levantine armada is secondary.
To repel us from the reliquary is her true purpose. She poisons this world, as she would try to poison us.
For the Wildlanders, the spearhead and the throne are one and the same.
The Warhawk accepts nothing less than complete dominance. The blood of giants flows through her veins, imbuing her with unrivaled strength.
The hawk is a symbol of the utmost supremacy- Disgrace it.
This matron has forever walked down a road with no destination. She seeks the truth of a question with no answer.
Her path is traced across the land by heaps of mangled and bloodlet corpses.
In her dying moments, she will understand the riddle imparted to her by the gods...
Selective breeding is perhaps the one intelligent skill the Troglodytes possess. The Gastrosaur is one such an example of their pursuit
of the perfect specimen. This monstrosity has been the bane of ground Caravans, and is no small part responsible for the capture
of a great many victims. -You know what must be done.
We can ignore this matter no longer. -A wurm is impeding us. A wurm so ancient, it has grown beyond comprehension.
Not only does it threaten to cause cave-ins down below, it terrorizes those on the surface, friend and foe alike.
If we are to proceed, we must do the unthinkable and defeat this Leviathan of the sands.
Reaching the Reliquary's gates will require more than some gardening shears to cut through the Cactonid thickets.
The Alraune guards the way. It is said to take the form of a mass of beautiful humans, fused into a pulpy flower-flesh.
Not only is it a charybdian danger, it seems to guide and direct the Cacti around it.
We slice and carve our way deeper into the grove. The walls of greenery close in,
driving us to one of the main Cactonid nodes. Its influence is vast, hence it is
guarded by layers of amorphous foliagic flesh, freely reforming to protect its horrific core. Whatever form its
living barrier takes, it shall be broken, and Cactonids all across the valley will feel the collapse of their eldritch nucleus.
Levantine scouts patrol this area. Do not allow them to report back.
The Levantine seek to establish an outpost here. Are we simply going to let them?
Armoured footsteps rattle in the distance. Silence them.
These ruins were once teeming with the Kvarotz people. Let us see what they have left behind.
There is much to be gleaned from these age-old workshops. Establish a route through this area.
Familiarize yourself with these catacombs, hence we be able to explore them easily in the coming days.
Work swiftly, let the sun prove to be our greatest adversary.
Keep to the shade when you are able. The day will not be a short one.
The Wildlanders are not opportunists. We must face them in any conditions.
Our foes are undaunted by the scorching heat. We shall be so in turn.
Let the moonlight be your guide amongst these crumbling ruins.
We cannot properly study these ruins if we are under attack. Make it safe here.
Drumbeats sound off from deeper into the ruins. Our foes have begun their rituals.
The clan's rites and rituals bring them strength. Bring an end to their ceremonies.
The cave-dwelling savages are vast in number- A culling is in order!
These 'troglodytes' bar access to the vast pools and formations of amber deep beneath the Reliquary. Remedy this..
With each atrocity and sacrifice, these creatures hobble closer to acheiving their dark divinity. Let us remedy this predicament.
The still-molten Amber flows freely here. It is no safer in its fluid state than in its crystalline form.
Filthy and perilous as these tunnels may be, there is plunder left to be found. Collect what you are able.
Within the heaps of debris and refuse among the troglodytes one can find an abundance of goods, and that ever-precious amber.
Complacency will be your undoing in this place. Stay Alert.
Trust nothing in these overtaken passageways. Deception surrounds you.
Do not allow greed to overcome your senses. We are here to scout ahead.
Large heaps of treasures are strewn about this place. You know well what that means by now.
The Kvarotz have kept their most prized valuables here. Pilfer to your heart's content!
Greed is a dangerous thing. But we are good friends with danger, are we not?
Locate the commander's camp and put a stop to his reign.
Seek out the snake's camp. Search for an excess of opulence and luxury.
These Wildlanders are eager to adopt Kvarotz weaponry. Be mindful of the gunpowder.
The Matron and her pack delight in torrents of blood and viscera. Let us give her a death befitting of her desire.
Battle your way to the bestial breeding pens. The Troglodytes will send their mightiest creatures to halt our progress,
So we must strike without delay.
If we are to strike the heart of the Troglodytes, we must clear this desert leviathan from our path.
When you have the mighty terror's attention, we will provide cannon fire.
An alluring scent fills the air, drawing prey deeper into the bloodthristy grove.
The core's grasp here is formidable. Follow the most constricted of paths.
You will arrive along the old road.
It winds with a troubling, serpent-like suggestion
So steel yourself
and remember there can be no bravery
without madness.
The old road will take you hell
but in that gaping abyss
we will find our redemption.
through the corrupted countryside.
Leading only, I fear
to ever more tenebrous places.
There is a sickness in the ancient pitted cobbles
of the old road
and on its writhing path
you will face viciousness, violence, and perhaps
other damnably transcendent terrors.
Do not dwell on the harships. Wallowing in misery is for the common drunkard.
Steady yourself, the winds are blowing strong!
We each carry a looming shadow my friend- of that we can have no doubts.
My path leading here has been a hard one, friend. And I find it safe to say things will not get easier.
Trust that fleeting light which guides us through the the darkness. But, do not become a moth.
It is through extraordinary fortune that I have made the acquaintance of this ship's Doctor. I would prefer not to keep him busy.
I treat each and every pair of hands to grace this ship as valuable- But there is no conquest without loss.
Regretably, not each soul among us will be able to witness the end of it all.
That looming megalith on the Valley's crest... We will break its grip on this world in time.
At times, I find myself frustrated by the isolation of this endeavor- That no neighboring kingdom dare aid us in this cause.
To return here after so long... It is difficult to describe exactly what this land means to me.
Secure the treasure, settle in, and sharpen your blades. There is much work ahead of us.
It is strange that a place so distant from the rest of the world can possess such marvelous technologies...
When was it when we last met? I believe I was still in the navy at the time.
The sails unfurl, and ballast pours out. We press on.
Our journey will be long. A patient leader seldom suffers losses.
Treat my ship hands well. You will not find a more skillful crew.
Rest deeply here. We must be at our finest to succeed.
I had not anticipated you would bring such an... uh... unconventional assortment of warriors.
The soils and sands below are my birthplace, yet it is not the home I remember...
My first mate is quite the oddity... though, I suppose the same thing could be said of you and I.
Rather frigid this high up isn't it? With a warm drink, you'll hardly notice.
Of all the commanders, generals, admirals, and lords that I have known, I would place my faith in none but you my friend.
We are progressing! Stone by stone, corpse by corpse, we march onward to the Reliquary.
They say that those who stray into the Reliquary are driven mad, or remolded into its mindless vassals. Amusing stories, eh?
The valley has no place for those lacking in constitution.
If they are unworthy now, they'd have no hope later.
We have greater tasks at hand than coddling this one.
This ship has no place for the incapable.
I see this one could not earn their keep. Unfortunate.
Amber is a curious substance. In its raw state, it is unstable. Volatile. We need every pair of hands available to convert it to a usable state.
It is not often you see a forge on a ship. Do not take this oddity for granted
My dear old friend... It is a relief my letter found its way to you so quickly. Settle in. Our task ahead is neither simple nor easy.
There will be losses, and they will be given proper remembrance, but we mustn't linger on our failures.
Our enemies are disciplined, wild, or naturally savage. No amount of preparation is too much.
Good. Soon it will be first nature to you.
Be it prized gem, or unremarkable stone, these mere objects are invaluable to our success.
As the age-old saying goes; how much is your life worth?
Welcome to the Valley. It is beautiful but not forgiving, and the careless will know its wrath.
Within one's own mind can be a terrible place to be if it is not cared for.
Our task is perilous. A small band of fighters will not suffice.
The valley does not condone foolhardiness. They must be in tune with the land.
Our forces should find refuge here when the burdens of the world become too much to carry.
I welcome you to my ship. Under this scorching sun, in this vast desert, on these hallowed lands,
there is much to be done. Settle in quickly. The Reliquary awaits us.
Battle in the valley will be different from what you are accustomed to.
Our foes think themselves indomitable. Teach them the truth.
There is always a place here for those who have been wronged, only to rise above
A woman that knows the real treasures of this place will be truly invaluable.
How strange that something so quaint as a fletched stick- can fell giants.
There are no bounties here, but quarries are plentiful.
Would-be holy warriors plague these lands. This man shall show what true devotion is.
A seasoned soldier. A mechanized demigod of death. Vestiges of a fallen land.
Those who embrace struggle and suffering will be at home in the lands below.
There is no shortage of tombs to be raided in these lands. Our task requires finance.
Some see savagery. I see resolve.
For the repentant thief, redemption can be its own prize.
In a time of untrustworthy people, a dog is a beacon of faith.
Only when we cannot sing and laugh, is hope truly lost.
It takes unbreakable resolve and devotion to the light to resist the corruption garnered from amber consumption.
This man's greatness is not in his strength; it is in his spirit.
Age brings wisdom. Wisdom brings success.
We can provide her with gunpowder if she can provide us with her talents.
The Pagan gods' power is not to be toyed with by those without the proper constitution.
There is much to be gleaned here for the alchemist and the doctor.
Through embracing one's fear, one may harness its powers.
Faith and care-giving are indispensable qualities in these lands.
For us, the power of the profaned light. For him, a promise to the end of his tale.
A brilliant woman, and a cautionary tale to those who would seek forbidden knowledge.
Gluttony is not necessarily a sin. It can have its... uh... purposes...
Our allies in trade are allies indeed. But business is still business
Let me... Soften the blow- This time...
*Coughing* It seems there has been a bit of an incident.
It is not desolate down there. Recesses of civility dot the hills...
